column1: Aromanian: faptu  Asturian: fechu  Catalan: fet  Danish: faktum  Dutch: feit  English: fact, factum, feat  French: fait  Friulian: fat
column3: German: Faktum  Hungarian: faktum  Italian: fatto  Occitan: fach  Portuguese: feito, facto, fato  Romanian: fapt  Romansch: fatg, fat  Russian: факт ‎(fakt)
column5: Sardinian: fatu  Sicilian: fattu  Spanish: fecho, fecha, hecho, facto  Swedish: faktum  Venetian: fato  Walloon: fwait
